a-slider/defaultValue.description: The default value of slider. When range is false, use number, otherwise, use [number, number]

a-slider/disabled.description: If true, the slider will not be interactable.

a-slider/dots.description: Whether the thumb can drag over tick only.

a-slider/included.description: Make effect when marks not null，true means containment and false means coordinative

a-slider/marks.description: Tick mark of Slider, type of key must be number, and must in closed interval [min, max] ，each mark can declare its own style.
a-slider/marks.defaultValue: { number: string|VNode } or { number: { style: object, label: string|VNode } } or { number: () => VNode }

a-slider/max.description: The maximum value the slider can slide to

a-slider/min.description: The minimum value the slider can slide to.

a-slider/step.description: The granularity the slider can step through values. Must greater than 0, and be divided by (max - min) . When marks no null, step can be null.

a-slider/tipFormatter.description: Slider will pass its value to tipFormatter, and display its value in Tooltip, and hide Tooltip when return value is null.

a-slider/value.description: The value of slider. When range is false, use number, otherwise, use [number, number]

a-slider/vertical.description: If true, the slider will be vertical.

a-slider/tooltipVisible.description: If true, Tooltip will show always, or it will not show anyway, even if dragging or hovering.
